Breakfast.name: Hobbit Hash
Breakfast.description: Five flapjacks, potatoes, leeks, garlic, cheese.

Breakfast.name: The Full Flapjack Breakfast
Breakfast.description: Eight flapjacks, two sausages, 3 eggs, 4 slices of bacon, beans, and a coffee.

Second Breakfast.name: Shire Strawberry Special
Second Breakfast.description: 6 flapjacks and a hearty serving of strawberry jam.

Second Breakfast.name: Buckland Blackberry Breakfast
Second Breakfast.description: 6 flapjacks covered in fresh blackberries. Served with a large side of sausage.

Elevenses.name: Lembas
Elevenses.description: Three pieces of traditional Elvish Waybread

Elevenses.name: Muffins of the Marish
Elevenses.description: A variety of 8 different types of muffins, served with tea.

Elevenses.name: Hasty Hobbit Hash
Elevenses.description: Potatoes with onions and cheese. Served with coffee.

Luncheon.name: Roast Pork
Luncheon.description: An entire pig slow-roasted over a fire.

Luncheon.name: Fish and Chips
Luncheon.description: Fish - fried. Chips - nice and crispy.

Afternoon Tea.name: Cookies and Cream
Afternoon Tea.description: A dozen cookies served with a vat of cream.

Dinner.name: Po-ta-to Platter
Dinner.description: Boiled. Mashed. Stuck in a stew.

Dinner.name: Bree and Apple
Dinner.description: One wheel of brie with slices of apple.

Dinner.name: Maggot's Mushroom Mashup
Dinner.description: It sounds disgusting, but its pretty good

Dinner.name: Fresh Baked Bread
Dinner.description: A whole loaf of the finest bread the Shire has to offer.

Supper.name: Sausage Sandwich
Supper.description: Six whole sausages served on a loaf of bread. Covered in onions, mushrooms and gravy.

Supper.name: Shire Supper
Supper.description: End the day as you started it, with a dozen flapjacks, 5 eggs, 3 sausages, 7 pieces of bacon, and a pint of ale.
